description: Order a Double Quarter Pounder with Cheese, add bacon, extra cheese, no onions. Large fries, 6 pc spicy mcnugget with sweet n sour + habanero ranch sauce. Side salad with no cucumbers, and a mocha frappe.
Order a 10-piece Chicken McNuggets with BBQ sauce, small fries, and a small Sprite
Order a Quarter Pounder with Cheese, no pickles, large fries, and a large Diet Coke
Order a McChicken sandwich, apple pie, and a medium sweet tea
Order a Filet-O-Fish, medium fries, and a chocolate milk
